plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Sometimes I have flowers! What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be big or small!

plant.question: I'm red and round and grow on a plant. You can eat me!

hints.text: ☀️ I get my color from the sun

plant.question: I am long and orange and bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I'm a tasty snack for bunnies!

plant.question: I am a big, tall plant with a thick, brown trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I have leaves that change color in the fall!
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day

plant.question: I am a flower that is yellow and big and follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make seeds you can eat!

plant.question: I have thorns and smell sweet. People give me to people they love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I can be red, pink, or white
⚠️ Be careful of my pointy parts

plant.question: I'm a vegetable that grows in a pod, and you can eat the little green seeds inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🫛 I am a type of legume

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You can scoop out my insides with a spoon
🐒 Monkeys don't eat me, even though I am a fruit!

plant.question: I am tall and green with pointy needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long!

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me cooked or raw. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 My name starts with a B!
🌳 I look like tiny trees clumped together.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I have a shell and I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I have a big fin on my back. What am I?
I walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 Sometimes people eat me with butter.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish with stripes. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I have suckers on my arms.

ocean.question: I’m a big animal in the ocean that sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make sounds that travel far in the water.
🌊 I am one of the biggest animals in the world.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ Some of us can give you a shock.

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature that looks like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms that stick out from my body.
🌊 I live on the bottom of the sea.

ocean.question: I'm a very smart ocean animal that likes to play. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I have a blowhole on top of my head.
🗣 I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🌊 I love to jump out of the water.
